name: NEI
description:
Your mecha is broken! Absorb your enemies and collect some junk to repair it! Remember to deliver all you gather before the time ends! The more resources you get, the more powerful your mecha will be! Unlock up to 3 deadly weapons to help you!

It's time for revenge! Run, shoot, and destroy the robots in your way! Survive as much as you can and earn a great score!

Damn! You mecha is broken again... Time to repair one more time, but be careful, if you can't earn enough junk everything will be lost! Don't relax, every time it gets harder!

This game was made in 48 hrs by Code Drifters for the Global Game Jam 2020 , the subject was "Repair"!

https://globalgamejam.org/2020/games/nei-9

Controller is strongly recommended for a better experience!
